short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn what Cyberchondria is. Replaces few health-related words to likely limit self-diagnoses, advises in-person health consultation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Encourages users to learn about Cyberchondria, substitutes specific health-related words to potentially prevent self-diagnoses while recommending to seek in-person health consultation - mainly, to not induce health-related web anxiety.
